knimeNode.name: Nominal Values
knimeNode.shortDescription: Collects and sets all nominal values for the columns selected in the dialog.

fullDescription.intro: Collects and sets all nominal values for the columns selected in the dialog. There is no upper limit defined for the number of values. The node iterates over the entire table and sets the nominal values in the specification of the output table.

ports.dataIn: Datatable to read all possible values from
